name: Chaos Hero
description:
Chaos Hero is a game that its all around luck and RNG.
In this game you have one level, and every time you finish the level you will get a debuff that will make the game harder (at the end of the description there is a list of all of the debuffs ingame.
Once you get to the finish line with all of the debuffs available you will win (Yes, this is possible but hard)

List of debuffs:

-Double Jump is canceled.
-Bad Platforms: The gray platforms in the level will turn red and will send you to the start of the level if you land on them.
-Raining Meteors: Well they are triangles, but they will fall on you like men, and will send you to the start of the level.
-Timer On: There will be a 60 second timer on the top right corner, if you don't finish in time you will be sent to the start of the level.
-Raising Lava: On the third section of the map (The vertical) the lava will raise up!
-Invert Controls: Well.. instead of going left you will go right and if you want to go right it will go to the left.
-Map Flip: The map will flip 180 degrees so it is all upside down.
-Random Kill: Our favorite debuff because this is nothing to do with the player, at the start of each run, a number will be generated as your "Lucky Number" and every 5 seconds there will be a random number generated as your "Killing Number" if they it matches to the "Lucky Number" you will go back to the start.

We used the following thing to create this game:
-Unity: As the engine.
-SFXR: For the jumping effect.
-Audacity: For the sound effect of getting a debuff.
Font- Bloodlust.

So this is all of the debuffs, we plan on adding more debuffs to the game so stay tuned!
This game has been made within 72 hours, by Team Boomix, for the brackeys gamejam 6
